title: [Kraken's Fall, First Pier]
description: Rough oak boards spread across the framework of the pier, while painted white cork bumpers offer a buffer along the edges, to prevent damage to ships tied-off nearby.  Three tie pilings on the on the western side are evenly spaced to allow for ease of docking and stand opposite a pair on the southeast.  A large white sign that reads "Pier 1 - Slips 1-5" is nailed to a support post.
